description: Has a lot of settings to tweak but good defaults so it's very easy to get started.

If you need Syncthing but don't want to layer packages on Silverblue/Kinoite, or download the official tarball on GNOME OS or Steam Deck. This is the way to go!

Could be even better if this app can also show notifications for new devices connecting, or folder marker missing as well.

Simple but does the job it's supposed to do! Thanks for making this, it's the only good alternative out there if you don't want to run Syncthing directly as other famous wrappers like Syncthing-GTK seem to not be maintained anymore.
summary: Simple but does the job it's supposed to do!

description: Does just enough to improve the syncthing experience, without being intrusive
